SEARCH
Package state

Class Reinforcement

java.lang.Object
state.Phase
state.Play
state.MainPlay
state.Reinforcement
public class Reinforcement extends MainPlay
Concrete state representing the Reinforcement phase of the game. Allows players to deploy armies and proceed to the Attack phase.
